senses.sense_definition: The inability to decide between different opinions or actions; hesitation or indecision.

examples.text: The project failed due to the manager's constant <w>vacillation</w> regarding the budget.
After a long period of <w>vacillation</w>, she finally accepted the job offer.

senses.sense_definition: The act of moving back and forth or swaying unsteadily.

examples.text: The scientist carefully measured the <w>vacillation</w> of the pendulum.
We noticed a slight <w>vacillation</w> of the compass needle during the storm.
